metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Student Becomes The Teacher is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Student Becomes The Teacher has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major,  and D Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
